data.title: The Books That Inspire America’s CEOs
data.meta_description: Recommended by Jim KochFounder,Boston Beer (#13)The ubiquitous biography ofApple visionary Steve Jobs struck a chord with brewerKoch. "The book focuses on Jobs’ fanatic commitment to quality and how it contributed to the success of Apple," Koch explains. "He [Jobs] stayed focused on the product and the company culture -to me those are the most important things for a founder to continually reinforce. It also included quite a bit about his failings, and as a leader this was just as valuable to read about."
data.text:
